statements: DELETE FROM image_processing_jobs WHERE status = 'failed' AND started_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM JobMetrics WHERE job_id = 101 AND metric_name = 'Processing Time';
DELETE FROM JobLogs WHERE job_id = 202 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM image_results WHERE job_id = 5 AND result_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ProcessingLogs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ImageResults WHERE result_status = 'failed' AND created_at < '2022-03-15';
